[i]Engross[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell at a time you couldn't cast a sorcery, you may have this enchantment become a 3/2 Rogue Wizard creature with covert in addition to its other types until the end of your next turn. [i](A creature with covert can't be blocked by creatures that weren't under their controllers control since the start of their last turn.)[/i]
{2}, Sacrifice this enchantment: Draw a card.
